title: Peer Expert Online Certification Course: Simulation-Based Competency Enhancement in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Expertise in Scientific Field and Over 3 Years of Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning in limited technical environments, emphasizing collaboration with peer experts and practical application

learning_goals: Learners can perform science-based problem-solving procedures with 85% accuracy through VR simulations within four weeks
Learners can apply at least three aspects of the educational content when collaborating with peer professionals in actual work settings after completing the training.
Learners receive a formative evaluation rating of 4.0/5.0 or higher for the practicality of weekly learning content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
